recipe.title: Tomato Papaya Salsa
ingredients: 1 ripe papaya (about 1 pound), peeled, seeded and cut into 1/4-inch dice
4 large ripe plum tomatoes, seeded and diced (1/4 inch)
1 1/2 teaspoons finely minced and seeded jalapeño
instructions: Gently combine all the ingredients in a bowl. Refrigerate, covered, until ready to use, up to 4 hours.
